channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Death metal's brutal growl may hold clues to healing damaged voices
item.description: We look at a study on how death metal singers produce their otherworldly vocals, and therapeutic applications that researchers are investigating.

item.title: A new study links the psychological benefits of swearing

item.title: Conversations bridge Public Health and MAHA

item.title: Our top global photo stories from 2025: Fearless women, solo polar bear, healing soups

item.title: After Outpatient Cosmetic Surgery, They Wound Up in the Hospital or Alone at a Recovery House
item.description: Some patients who had liposuction or other surgeries later required emergency hospital care — and some died, court records show.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.
